short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View FFBE Builds inline from FFBE Equip.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FFBE Equip links on Reddit are now hoverable, so you can see the builds without leaving Reddit!

v0.4 Updates
---------------------
Support NV in images and CSS.

v0.3 Updates
---------------------
Pull old Reddit CSS into new Reddit.

v0.2 Updates
----------------------
Start to support older builds by loading item data.
Fix some hovering issues.
